name: appwrite
description: Appwrite is an open-source self-hosted backend server that abstract and simplify complex and repetitive development tasks behind a very simple REST API

scripts.build: npm run build:types && npm run build:esm && npm run build:cjs && npm run build:iife
scripts.build:cjs: rollup dist/esm/sdk.js --format cjs --name Appwrite -e cross-fetch/polyfill --context global -m --no-esModule -o dist/cjs/sdk.js
scripts.build:iife: rollup dist/esm/sdk.js --format iife --name Appwrite -e cross-fetch/polyfill --context window -m --no-esModule -o dist/iife/sdk.js
